Body: https://i.imgur.com/58fZRSr.png  INTRODUCTION  AMICORUM (Latin word close to the meaning of Gathering of Friends) is an innovative platform that will decentralize the ticket re-sale industry using blockchain and secure identity platform.  The platform will be secure, transparent and free of any transaction/processing fees for buying and selling of only authenticated tickets in the secondary resale market.  Sellers will be able to list their tickets in fiat (using a market-feed oracle, the platform will calculate AMI prices at the time of purchase) that will be authenticated with smart contract and Buyers will be able to buy tickets with the AMI token (the new cryptocurrency based on Ethereum blockchain) at 0 transaction fee and 0 processing fees.  Rewards will also be offered to users for transacting on the platform.  WEBISTE I WHITEPAPER I TELEGRAM I FACEBOOK I TWITTER I LINKEDIN I REDDIT I ANN THREADI   https://i.imgur.com/jaEW95i.png  PRE SALE STARTS ON April 1, 2018 WITH 20% Bonus Tokens  TOTAL SUPPLY DURING PRE-SALE – 20,000,000 AMI TOKENS  TOTAL TOKEN SUPPLY DISTRIBUTION  80%: Total ICO Distribution – 40,000,000 15%: Reserved for Founders/Management – 7,500,000 2%: Reserved for Advisors – 1,000,000 3%: Reserved for Marketing/Loyalty Purposes – 1,500,000   CURRENT PROBLEMS IN THE REAL WORLD  Even though we have seen a continuous growth in technologies and developments within the global ticketing industry, there are still a large number of problems including:  Transaction Fee – Although the seller is able to sell their tickets online, the buyer still needs to pay for the ticket, platform fee and a transaction fee that is charged by their bank.  The AMICORUM.LIVE platform will take away this pain from the buyers and provide a seamless experience free from any transaction fee or bank fee.  The platform will be used to sell tickets and buy tickets at the cost listed.  Untrusted/Counterfeit – Despite the usual warnings on the website asking buyers to only buy tickets from the box office or a reputable ticket exchange website, they still direly go straight into this problem.  And even fuel it.  The most usual case is when the same ticket is sold to 10-15 enthusiasts or even more.   The first ticket holder to arrive gets to view the event or attend the concert/festival and the rest have to just go back home.   The problem creates a two-way issue – one for the enthusiasts who were keen on attending the event and spend a lot of money and other the organizers who could have sold one more ticket to the enthusiasts.  At the least, there is no one winning here.  AMICORUM.LIVE will provide a platform with 0 transaction/processing fees and integrate it with a Secure Identity Platform to validate the authentication of the users and the tickets with smart contracts.  PROJECT OVERVIEW  AMICORUM.LIVE will be a web and app blockchain ecosystem that will provide secure, transparent and “0” transaction/processing fee platform for the ticket resale industry.  Our core competencies will include eliminating fraud and use secure identity platform for validation of identity and tickets with smart contracts.  We will be taking proven traditional models and adapting it to the crypto economy with the core focus on niche markets – festivals and concerts only.  It will be peer to peer ecosystem designed For mainstream adoption.  MARKET AND SCOPE  GLOBAL TICKET RE-SALE - $8.9bln in 2016 TARGET MARKET – 20% of $24.55 billion by 2022  PROCESS  - Seller will list the tickets on AMICORUM.LIVE platform - The secure identity platform will verify identity and ticket validation is confirmed by the smart contract. - The platform will convert the cost of the ticket real time in AMI - The buyer will review and confirm the purchase of the tickets in AMI Tokens - The seller receives the full amount in their corresponding wallet address without any deductions (in AMI Tokens) - The buyer receives the tickets in their online wallets once the transaction is confirmed and listed on the blockchain.   The platform automates all business processes related to listing, price conversion, sale, re-sale, rewards and redemption of the festival or concert tickets while timely distributing the funds associated with each sale.  All ticket sales will be finalized the same day of the purchase as the blockchain confirms transactions within minutes.  This means you don’t have to wait for the payments to be sent from your bank to the ticket holder.
